trans-unit.source: Defines the methods that convert permission object state to and from XML element representation.
trans-unit.target: 定義與 XML 項目表示轉換狀態物件的權限的方法。

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of permissions is used to describe instances of permissions for code requests, declarative security permission sets, and security policy configuration.
trans-unit.target: 權限的 XML 表示法用來描述執行個體的程式碼要求、 宣告式安全性權限集和安全性原則設定的權限。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must implement this interface for any new permission object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您必須實作此介面之任何新的權限物件。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構具有指定狀態的 XML 編碼方式的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the <xref:System.Security.ISecurityEncodable.ToXml%2A> and FromXml methods to make the objects security-encodable.
trans-unit.target: 擴充安全性物件的自訂程式碼必須實作<xref:System.Security.ISecurityEncodable.ToXml%2A>和 FromXml 方法，使物件安全性 encodable。</xref:System.Security.ISecurityEncodable.ToXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML 編碼用來重新建構安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全性物件和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the ToXml and <xref:System.Security.ISecurityEncodable.FromXml%2A> methods to make the objects security-encodable.
trans-unit.target: 擴充安全性物件的自訂程式碼必須實作 ToXml 和<xref:System.Security.ISecurityEncodable.FromXml%2A>方法，以將物件變成安全性 encodable。</xref:System.Security.ISecurityEncodable.FromXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全性物件，包含所有狀態資訊的 XML 編碼方式。
